abstract: The move comes amid rising demand in emerging markets and in the United States, and after the plane maker’s parent company announced a jump in 2013 net income.
snippet: The move comes amid rising demand in emerging markets and in the United States, and after the plane maker’s parent company announced a jump in 2013 net income.
lead_paragraph: PARIS — Record demand for new commercial jets drove a 22 percent jump in profit at Airbus Group last year, prompting the European plane maker on Wednesday to announce a 10 percent increase in production of its most popular single-aisle plane.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: European Aeronautic Defense and Space Co
